name: Dimensius, the All-Devouring
description: Deep within Manaforge Omega, Dimensius--the All-Devouring and destroyer of K'aresh--is slowly waking as his devoted ethereal followers use the Dark Heart to give him sustenance. If they succeed, they will unleash a being of unfathomable power that could destroy the very fabric of reality.

item.name: Formula: Enchant Weapon - Authority of the Depths

sections.title: Overview
sections.body_text:
Dimensius attempts to [Devour] players almost immediately, and again every time he reaches 100 energy. His [Growing Hunger] increases with each cast, pushing the players' [Collective Gravity] to its limits.

When Dimensius' health is depleted, he pulls players into the Dark Heart where they must quickly fly with Xal'atath to safety. He releases his conquered rivals to halt players' advance and attempts to obliterate them with [Extinction] and [Gamma Burst].

After a devastating counter-attack from the players and Xal'atath, Dimensius begins to [Extinguish the Stars]. Upon reaching 100 energy he again attempts to [Devour] everything around him, pulling his [Accretion Disk] ever closer.

sections.title: Tanks
sections.body_text:
$bullet;[Massive Smash] knocks all players away from Dimensius' target.
$bullet;Players who receive too many applications of [Touch of Oblivion] are killed instantly.
$bullet;[Fists of the Voidlord] damages and knocks away players near Dimensius' target with every melee attack.

sections.title: Damage Dealers
sections.body_text:
$bullet;Living Mass leaves behind [Excess Mass] when defeated, which can be used to gain [Collective Gravity] and rescue [Airborne] players.
$bullet;Players can stand in [Antimatter] to reduce its raidwide damage.
$bullet;[Fists of the Voidlord] damages and knocks away players near Dimensius' target with every melee attack.

sections.title: Healers
sections.body_text:
$bullet;[Devour] and [Extinguish the Stars] inflict heavy damage to all players.
$bullet;Players can stand in [Antimatter] to reduce its raidwide damage.
$bullet;[Fists of the Voidlord] damages and knocks away players near Dimensius' target with every melee attack.

sections.title: The Devoured Lords
sections.body_text: Dimensius releases his conquered rivals to halt the players' advance.
